page.title: 14Fountain Forestery Ltd.
page.content: Fountain Forestry, which owns plantations in Butleigh Wood, is a business centred in Somerset and Avon. Altogether the company owns about 2500 acres of woodland of which some 70% is hardwood. In Somerset conifers are grown mainly. The company sells the wood to local timber merchants and farmers. The business, established in 1958 by Anthony Wrightson, employs about 400 people of which a high proportion are contracted labourers. The main animal pest to the trees is the common wood squirrel which feeds on the pine cones and trees. All the company records are kept on computer disc for ease of access.
